title: Hillserpent Academy
description: Owen Davinforth has been expelled from Hillserpent Academy for the last eight months and now he is permitted to return. But things have changed at the academy - and not for the good. Owen's falling for a new guy, and a dark force is working its way around the school - and it's aiming straight for Owen. Can he stop who - or what - it is before it's too late? What lies behind these gates? You will soon know. (This novel is a standalone, no sequel is planned, but it is possible in the future.)
author: Richard Denney
